name: non_blocking_smelting
title: Non blocking smelting
author: LordOdin
description: Changes smelting recipes so they don't block smelters. Balance isn't changed. Example: 5 iron => 1 steel changes to 1 iron => 1 steel with 0.2 probability. Should work fine for modded ores too. Does not affect complex alloy recipes with may ingridients.
